title: 1976 BBC Feature on Big Jim’s Bike Ride
content:
While some of our team is sober over here, we still wanted to share this fun video from a 1976 BBC feature on Big Jim and his (boozy) mountain bike ride to visit a mate. Give it a watch for a truly warming narrative and the surprise twist at the end!

The post 1976 BBC Feature on Big Jim’s Bike Ride appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
